Content: 2*p62788a0220* answer all questions. 1 a teacher demonstrated echolocation to her students.  the teacher made a loud sound and an echo returned from a distant building as shown in the diagram. buildings the teacher and five students stood a distance s from the building.  each student measured the time t between hearing the sound and hearing the echo. (a) state one source of uncertainty in the values of t measured by the students.(1) (b) the table shows the values recorded by the five students. student12345t / s0.880.870.910.750.88  the students suggested that they should include in their calculations all the values of t.   the teacher suggested the value recorded by student 4 should be discarded.
